name: Gravemir Full Demo
description:
This is a demo of a work in progress

GRAVEMIR it’s a top-down space shooter inspired by Tyrian with a strong focus on customization.

The story is about a faction that was almost destroyed after they attempted a coup d’etat against Earth’s government. This faction, called Teria Idelos, stole a spacecraft carrier from the Earth-controlled UEG forces, where a secret weapon called Gravemir was being stored.

What I’m looking for: All the feedback I can have! this is my first game development project and my goal is to have a polished work I can release as a full-fledged game.

Ships and all the 3d art is done by me, placeholder music by: Aivi & Surasshu.

you can find their site  in this link. 


PLEASE GIVE US UR FEEDBACK

IF THE GAME DOESN'T RUN ONLINE REINSTALL YOUR WEBPLAYER/DOWNLOAD THE OFFLINE VER.
